Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.network.node

Interface INetworkNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
CableNetworkNode, ConstructorNetworkNode, CrafterManagerNetworkNode, CrafterNetworkNode, CraftingMonitorNetworkNode, DestructorNetworkNode, DetectorNetworkNode, DiskDriveNetworkNode, DiskManipulatorNetworkNode, ExporterNetworkNode, ExternalStorageNetworkNode, FluidInterfaceNetworkNode, FluidStorageNetworkNode, GridNetworkNode, ImporterNetworkNode, InterfaceNetworkNode, NetworkNode, NetworkReceiverNetworkNode, NetworkTransmitterNetworkNode, RelayNetworkNode, RootNetworkNode, SecurityManagerNetworkNode, StorageMonitorNetworkNode, StorageNetworkNode, WirelessTransmitterNetworkNode
public interface INetworkNode
Represents a node in the network.

  • Method Details

    • getEnergyUsage

      int getEnergyUsage()
      Returns:
      the energy usage of this node

    • getItemStack

      @Nonnull net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack getItemStack()
      Returns the stack that is displayed in the controller GUI. Can be an empty stack if no stack should be shown.
      Returns:
      the item stack of this node

    • onConnected

      void onConnected(INetwork network)
      Called when this node is connected to a network.
      Parameters:
      network - the network

    • onDisconnected

      void onDisconnected(INetwork network)
      Called when this node is disconnected from a network. This happens when the node is removed, or if the network is removed. If the network runs out of power or no longer runs due to redstone mode settings, this won't be called and has to be detected manually.
      Parameters:
      network - the network

    • isActive

      boolean isActive()
      Whether this node is active, independent of the network.
      Returns:
      true if this node is active, false otherwise

    • getNetwork

      @Nullable INetwork getNetwork()
      Returns:
      the network, or null if this node is not connected to any network

    • update

      void update()
      Updates a network node.

    • write

      net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag write(net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag tag)
      Writes the network node data to NBT.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag
      Returns:
      the written tag

    • getPos

      net.minecraft.core.BlockPos getPos()
      Returns:
      the position of this network node

    • getLevel

      net.minecraft.world.level.Level getLevel()
      Returns:
      the level of this network node

    • markDirty

      void markDirty()
      Marks this node as dirty for saving.

    • getId

      net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation getId()
      Returns:
      the id of this node as specified in INetworkNodeRegistry

    • canConduct

      default boolean canConduct(net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction
      Returns:
      whether a network signal can be conducted in the given direction.

    • canReceive

      default boolean canReceive(net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction
      Returns:
      whether the network node can receiver network connections from this side

    • getOwner

      @Nullable UUID getOwner()
      Returns:
      the owner

    • setOwner

      void setOwner(@Nullable UUID owner)
      Parameters:
      owner - the owner
